text: The Blue Picardy Spaniel (or Ã‰pagneul Bleu de Picardie in French) is a medium size gundog of the type called Spaniels. This breed was developed in France around the start of the 20th century. ==Colour== The colour of this dog is always a grey and black specked colour that looks like it is really blue. ==Temperment== The Blue Picardy Spaniel is usually a happy dog that is gentle with children and gets along well with other dogs. They love their work as hunters but also love to play. They need plenty of exercise. ==Popularity== Although this dog originated in France, it is now more popular as a hunting dog in Canada. ==References== Category:Spaniels Category:FCI breeds Category:Dog breeds originating in France Category:Rare dog breeds
